TopicTitle: just returned from a two month hiatus from KSP

Articles.Content:
Just posting cause i never had a chance to the first time i found the forums

i will try to continue contributing to this forum again now that i am back

for those wondering why i left in the first place, it was due to lack of personal time due to school and sadly other things captivating my attention

Like many, I never posted here when I joined, either.

That was much more recently, however. In any case, welcome back!

Happy landings!
Welp, hope you have plenty of time for the ksp-ing now!
Welcome back to this great game!
